statements: SELECT * FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE volunteer_id = 3;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_phone FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE volunteer_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT event_id, volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_email, volunteer_phone FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE volunteer_phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE volunteer_id = 100 ORDER BY event_date;
SELECT event_name, volunteer_name, volunteer_phone FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE volunteer_id = 200 AND event_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY volunteer_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE volunteer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY event_id;
SELECT * FROM CleanUpEvents WHERE event_date < '2022-04-01' AND volunteer_phone IS NOT NULL ORDER BY volunteer_name, event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM Events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, phone_number FROM Volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Volunteers WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, phone_number, address FROM Volunteers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT volunteer_name, event_name, event_role FROM volunteer JOIN volunteer_event ON volunteer.volunteer_id = volunteer_event.volunteer_id JOIN event ON event.event_id = volunteer_event.event_id;
SELECT * FROM volunteer WHERE volunteer_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_id, volunteer_name, volunteer_email FROM volunteer WHERE volunteer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT volunteer_name, event_name, event_role FROM volunteer JOIN volunteer_event ON volunteer.volunteer_id = volunteer_event.volunteer_id JOIN event ON volunteer_event.event_id = event.event_id;

SELECT volunteer.volunteer_name, event.event_name, event.event_location FROM volunteer, event, volunteer_event WHERE volunteer.volunteer_id = volunteer_event.volunteer_id AND event.event_id = volunteer_event.event_id ORDER BY volunteer.volunteer_name ASC, event.event_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Volunteers;
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, location FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT volunteer_name, event_name, task_description FROM Volunteers INNER JOIN Volunteer_Events ON Volunteers.volunteer_id = Volunteer_Events.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Tasks ON Volunteer_Events.event_id = Tasks.event_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_tasks FROM Tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT volunteer_name, email FROM Volunteers WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT event_name, location, event_date FROM Events ORDER BY event_date DESC;

SELECT v.volunteer_name, e.event_name, t.task_description FROM Volunteers v JOIN Volunteer_Events ve ON v.volunteer_id = ve.volunteer_id JOIN Events e ON ve.event_id = e.event_id JOIN Tasks t ON e.event_id = t.event_id ORDER BY t.task_description ASC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(ve.volunteer_event_id) AS total_volunteers FROM Events e JOIN Volunteer_Events ve ON e.event_id = ve.event_id GROUP BY e.event_name;

SELECT v.volunteer_name, e.event_name, te.registration_date FROM Volunteers v JOIN Volunteer_Events ve ON v.volunteer_id = ve.volunteer_id JOIN Events e ON ve.event_id = e.event_id JOIN Tasks te ON ve.volunteer_event_id = te.volunteer_event_id WHERE te.task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE volunteer_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM Event ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM Volunteer WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT activity_name, activity_date, location FROM CleanUpActivity WHERE location = 'Park';
SELECT * FROM Volunteer;
SELECT volunteer_id, name, email FROM Volunteer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM Event WHERE event_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT v.name, v.email, e.event_name FROM Volunteer v INNER JOIN Volunteer_Event ve ON v.volunteer_id = ve.volunteer_id INNER JOIN Event e ON ve.event_id = e.event_id;

SELECT v.name, ca.activity_name, va.hours_spent FROM Volunteer v INNER JOIN Volunteer_Activity va ON v.volunteer_id = va.volunteer_id INNER JOIN CleanUpActivity ca ON va.activity_id = ca.activity_id WHERE va.hours_spent > 5;
